name: camelids
description:
You're in 'Camelids'. It's had a fairly recent makeover from the facilities team to give it a Moroccan theme with comfortable seating and tasteful decoration.
It blends the function of a meeting room with the space to relax and chat.
One wall has a small shelf whilst the UX team have filled another wall with post-it notes.
A window runs the length of the room looking out over the atrium stairs.

attributes.defaultResult:
You press your face to the glass and make childish signs through the window.
Nobody seems to notice and you feel a little foolish.

inventory.detailedDescription:
Pretty standard office furniture.
It provides plenty of desktop working space for a large group of creative people.
They look like standard meeting room chairs although they're surprisingly comfortable and ride on casters.

attributes.defaultResult:
Seeing as there's a sofa in here to rest on you decide the best use for one of these is office-surfing.
You wheel around the room dodging obstacles for a minute or two before realising you're still on probation and there's every chance you can be seen by everyone through the window in here.
